content.question: What, if anything, is printed as a result of executing the code segment?

choices.label: Nothing is printed due to an  ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.
Hello, it’s nice to meet you
Hey, it really is a pleasure to finally catch up with you all
Hi, it is great to get to see you again

content.answer: Hi, it is great to get to see you again

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
